lead_paragraph: After years of corruption scandals, FIFA has a chance to transform itself, King, the tennis great, said in a keynote speech at FIFA headquarters.

headline.print_headline: Billie Jean King Urges Infantino to Hire Women in FIFA Jobs
headline.main: Billie Jean King Urges Gianni Infantino to Hire Women at FIFA

snippet: After years of corruption scandals, FIFA has a chance to transform itself, King, the tennis great, said in a keynote speech at FIFA headquarters....
